g.text: Core banking platform providing online and mobile banking services
Provides online banking functionality to customers via their web browser
Provides banking functionality to customers via their mobile device
Allows bank staff to manage customer accounts and handle issues
Routes API requests to appropriate microservices
Sends notifications to customers via different channels
A customer of the bank with one or more accounts
Staff who support customers and manage accounts
Manages customer accounts, transactions, and balances
Processes payments and transfers to external accounts
